summary: Implements a graph‑based decoder that leverages a token language model to perform decoding and forced alignment. Supports multiple graph topologies (default, compact, shared_blank, minimal) with optional self‑loops and allows explicit configuration of parameters, overriding any external config.
business_intent: Enable flexible, configurable token‑level language model decoding for applications such as speech or text processing, providing both standard decoding and precise forced alignment capabilities.
